Text: Hmm - lets work this one out : 154 pictures in a 6.3 MByte file.  And you call this HD !  That's lie #1.  Then you say it's in a password protected file (that's bullsh1t #1) and that you supply the password - that's probably lie # 2.   I suggest you're just full of cr@p and that all this is cr@p too !
